name: Clarice

ski.name: CHAINING BLADE
desc: Clarice hurls a blade in a target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy unit along its path and causes Root for 1s.

ski.name: BLINDING BLADE
desc: Leaves a blade on the ground and teleports to the target point, granting bonus physical damage to the next basic attack for 5s. The blade detonates after 0.5s, dealing physical damage to the area and causing Movement Slow for 1s.
study: Teleport, enhance basic attack. Detonate and Movement Slow

ski.name: RAIN OF BLADES
desc: ACTIVE: Clarice summons a rain of blades that slowly moves in the target direction, dealing continuous physical damage to enemy units within its area. PASSIVE: Killing blows on enemy units grant bonus Coins.
study: Continuous area physical damage, bonus Coins
update: Physical Damage â†‘ Bonus Coins â†‘

ski.name: FLYING EDGE
desc: After every 3 basic attacks, the next basic attack deals extra bonus physical damage and Pierces enemy units in a straight line.
study: At full stacks, the next basic attack pierces enemy units

story: The gods made her 20% goddess, 30% demon, and 50% human flesh and bone. Clarice was her name, and perhaps it was her own humanity that stopped her from causing that intended chaos. She chose to give up immortality and live as a human.
